inclusion.criterion: Histological/cytologically documented primary FIGO Stage IIIA, IIIB, IIIC1, IIIC2, IVA and IVB uterine serous carcinoma.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Distant metastasis outside the abdominal cavity.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient has impairment of hepatic, renal or hematologic function as defined by the following baseline laboratory values: Serum SGOT and /or SGPT > 2.5 times the institutional upper limit of normal (ULN).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, mitral valve prolapse, atrial fibrillation, hyperlipemia, hypertension, chronic kidney disease, hypothyroidism, and anemia. She recently presented with fevers/rigors, bandemia, mid-abdominal pain, radiating to the left flank, and was diagnosed with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
